name: iscroll_table
description: a table component for test npm packages

scripts.fetchtag: git tag | xargs -I {} git tag -d {} && git fetch --tags
scripts.rm:tag: git tag -l | xargs -n 1 git push --delete origin
scripts.ra: npm run release -- --prerelease alpha && npm run push
scripts.rb: npm run release -- --prerelease beta && npm run push
scripts.rr: npm run release -- --prerelease rc && npm run push
scripts.push: git push && git push --follow-tags origin master

author: liukun
